name: SphereX
description:
SphereX is a puzzle 3D platformer game, where you control a sphere to make your way through hard obstacles courses.

  • Collect all Treasures
  • Unlock all skins
  • Win all achievements
  • Beat all challenges
  • Do the best times

Explore the different areas of the world... but watch out for the traps!

Developed by

Ashley Prazeres (Gameplay Programmer, UI Programmer)

João Gomes (2D Artist, 3D Modeler)

Ricardo Sousa (Music composer, Sound designer)
